title: Orlando Bloom & Miranda Kerr's Son Flynn Has 'Great' Relationship With Katy Perry
text:
Miranda Kerr is opening up about what goes on behind the scenes concerning her and Orlando Bloom ‘s six-year-old son Flynn .
The 33-year-old model says Flynn has a “great” relationship with Orlando ‘s current girlfriend, Katy Perry .
“They’re great,” Miranda told People . “They get along really well.”
“We’re a modern family,” she went on. “ Orlando and I are literally like family, he’s like a brother to me. It’s very weird, but we really care for each other and we have a great relationship, so I feel very lucky.”
Miranda and Orlando welcomed Flynn into the world back in January 2011 before calling it quits in 2013, and Orlando and Katy have been dating for over a year now.
We’re glad to hear this “modern family” gets along so well together!
